sections.heading: Privacy Policy Statement
content: Your privacy is important to us. It is Djast's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may
collect from you across our website, and other sites we own and operate.

sections.heading: Information Collection and Use
content: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and
lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we're collecting it and how it will be used.

sections.heading: Google Account Integration
content: You can sign up with your Google account so your Djast account username will be prefilled with your name and your email.

sections.heading: GitHub Account Integration
content: You can sign up with your GitHub account so your Djast account username will be prefilled with your GitHub username.

sections.heading: Data Retention and Protection
content: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data
we store, we'll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access,

sections.heading: Information Sharing
content: We don't share any personally identifying information publicly or with third parties, except when required to by law.

sections.heading: Data Protection Role
content: We act in the capacity of a data controller and a data processor with regard to the personal data processed through Djast
and the services in terms of the applicable data protection laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

sections.heading: External Site Links
content: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content
and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.

sections.heading: Refusal of Information
content: You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you
with some of your desired services.

sections.heading: Acceptance of Privacy Practices
content: Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you
have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.
